article_title: Walgreens Taps Italian Billionaire Pessina As Permanent CEO

article_metadata.description: VideoStefano Pessina, the Italian billionaire who ran European drugstore chain Alliance Boots before its merger last year with Walgreens, has agreed to become the permanent top executive of the combined global pharmacy giant Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA). The 73-year-old Pessina, who is the largest individual shareholder of Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA) [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
